participant_1.name: Jessie
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and spirited, Jessie loves the thrill of racing and enjoys the freedom of the open road.
participant_1.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. my main transportation is my motorbike. i have light skin with big brown eyes. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

participant_2.name: Gerald
participant_2.personality: Wise and humorous, Gerald has a wealth of experiences and a playful outlook on life.
participant_2.background: i'm very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television.

content.text: The CanAm Spyder; it's a cross between a motorcycle and an ATV.
The Alfa 4C is better than the quad bike.
The Skoda Yeti, with a helicopter on the roof, hahaha...
